profile.args: acodec=flac ar=44100 channels=2 crf=%quality f=mp4 properties=lossless/H.264 vcodec=libx264
profile.name: CPU Lossless

profile.args: acodec=flac ar=44100 bf=0 channels=2 crf=%quality f=mp4 g=250 movflags=+faststart vcodec=libx264
profile.name: MP4-H264/AAC

profile.args: acodec=flac ar=44100 channels=2 f=mp4 rc=constqp vcodec=h264_nvenc vq=%quality vqp=%quality
profile.name: NVENC H264/FLAC Lossless
